Package UserData

Class User

java.lang.Object
UserData.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user in the system. It contains information about the user, their card details, account status, shopping cart, previous orders, loyalty points, and vouchers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    User(Info info)
    Creates a new User instance with the specified user information.
